step_feedback.feedback: You're doing a great job sitting or standing comfortably. Try to keep your hands gently on your abdomen as you inhale.
Excellent! You're placing your hands on your abdomen. Remember to inhale slowly through your nose and tighten your whole body muscles.
Good effort on the inhale! Focus on visualizing the fluid moving towards your chest as you tighten your muscles.
Well done on the exhale! As you relax your muscles, visualize pushing the fluid out. Keep the exhales slow and controlled.

exercise_summary: You're doing great with this deep breathing exercise! Remember to inhale through your nose, tightening your body, and exhale through your mouth, relaxing. This helps move fluid and promotes healing.
